alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Richland and central Franklin Parishes through 200 AM CDT... At 130 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Columbia, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buckner and Liddieville around 140 AM CDT. Winnsboro around 145 AM CDT. Mangham and Archibald around 150 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Baskin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana.
